prompt_base: hyperdetailed cinematic portrait of a massive, barrel-chested alien warrior, very tan skin tone, giant white horseshoe mustache, completely bald head, wearing a structured Pride Trooper uniform, stoic expression
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, extreme muscle definition, detailed skin pores and wrinkles (like an older man), hyperrealistic texture on the white mustache, high contrast volumetric lighting, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, CGI, plastic texture, smooth skin, blurry mustache, toy, flat lighting, low quality, deformed anatomy, youthful face
